mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* ComMapper.sectionInsert */ SECTION ( NO, /*순번*/ SECTION_CD, /*대분류코드*/ SECTION_NM, /*대분류명*/ USE_YN, /*사용여부*/ REG_YMD /*등록일자*/ ) VALUES( ,#{SECTION_CD} /*대분류코드*/ (SELECT NVL(MAX(NO), 0)+1 FROM SECTION WHERE SECTION_CD = #{SECTION_CD}) /*순번*/ ,#{SECTION_NM} /*대분류명*/ ,#{USE_YN} /*사용여부*/ ,SYSDATE /*등록일자*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* ComMapper.sectionUpdate */ SECTION SET SECTION_CD = #{SECTION_CD} /*대분류코드*/ ,SECTION_NM = #{SECTION_NM} /*대분류명*/ ,USE_YN = #{USE_YN} /*사용여부*/ ,REG_YMD = sysdate WHERE NO = #{NO}
